cab.content: 9 00:0HIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITATOC MAJESTY'S aOVERKKEHT.)SECRET, G.T. TO-l.TAR CABINET.Circulated by the Secretary of rotate for India,From ViGeroy, foreign Department, 25'th August, 1918.(Received 7 a.m. ,26th.) ..Secret. Weekly report. As result of death of Miangul Sherin Badshah (vide report for last week), Bajaur Mullahs have declared Ghaza against Nawab of Dir, and lashkars reported collecting. Elsewhere frontier quiet.
